description: Golden dataset for post-processing accuracy testing. Expected outputs are calibrated against the full 10-processor pipeline.

test_cases.input: theyconfigure the system that'slike important
test_cases.expected: They configure the system that's like important.
test_cases.description: Common merged words from Whisper: they+verb, possessive+'like'

test_cases.input: i'mjust implementing the apikey validation withthe servicelayer
test_cases.expected: I'm just implementing the API key validation with the service layer.
test_cases.description: Technical terms and contractions with merged preposition+the

test_cases.input: shouldbe ready forthe meeting inthe conference room
test_cases.expected: Should be ready for the meeting in the conference room.

test_cases.input: the usecase willbe reviewed bythe team atthe end ofthe week
test_cases.expected: The use case will be reviewed by the team at the end of the week.

test_cases.input: check the textfield forthe dblayer connection
test_cases.expected: Check the text field for the DB layer connection.

test_cases.input: this is done.Now we begin
test_cases.expected: This is done. Now we begin.
test_cases.description: Merged sentence boundary: missing space after period

test_cases.input: the code works.The tests pass
test_cases.expected: The code works. The tests pass.

test_cases.input: great!The results look good
test_cases.expected: Great! The results look good.

test_cases.input: i went to the store. i came home
test_cases.expected: I went to the store. I came home.

test_cases.input: the project is done. we can deploy now. it works well
test_cases.expected: The project is done. We can deploy now. It works well.

test_cases.input: The database , which is important , needs work
test_cases.expected: The database, which is important, needs work.

test_cases.input: don'tknow what'sthe problem withthe backend servicelayer forthe endpoints
test_cases.expected: Don't know what's the problem with the backend service layer for the endpoints.
test_cases.description: Multiple merged word patterns in one sentence

test_cases.input: theyconfigure the apikeys forthe usecase validation inthe servicelayer
test_cases.expected: They configure the API keys for the use case validation in the service layer.

test_cases.input: This text is already perfect.
test_cases.expected: This text is already perfect.

test_cases.input: The API key is valid.
test_cases.expected: The API key is valid.

test_cases.input: The URL configuration is valid.
test_cases.expected: The URL configuration is valid.

test_cases.input: this is a very long sentence that just keeps going without any punctuation or proper capitalization it should probably be split into multiple sentences for better readability
test_cases.expected: This is a very long sentence that just keeps going without any punctuation or proper capitalization it should probably be split into multiple sentences for better readability.
test_cases.description: Long run-on sentence (under 200 chars, no split expected)

test_cases.input: we use github for version control
test_cases.expected: We use GitHub for version control.

test_cases.input: the javascript api returns json data
test_cases.expected: The JavaScript API returns JSON data.

test_cases.input: the voxcore project uses hammerspoon
test_cases.expected: The VoxCore project uses Hammerspoon.

test_cases.expected: Deploy with the Kubernetes Docker setup for the TypeScript backend.
test_cases.description: Dictionary terms combined with merged word fixes

test_cases.input: I um think this is uh really good
test_cases.expected: I think this is really good.
test_cases.description: Simple filler word removal: um, uh

test_cases.input: basically the system works well
test_cases.expected: The system works well.

test_cases.input: it's you know a great result
test_cases.expected: It's a great result.

test_cases.input: don'tknow how to fix the problem
test_cases.expected: Don't know how to fix the problem.

test_cases.input: ive been working on the project
test_cases.expected: I've been working on the project.

test_cases.expected: I think the API key should be configured for the backend.
test_cases.description: Disfluency removal + merged words + technical terms

test_cases.expected: We deploy with the Kubernetes API for the Docker containers.
test_cases.description: Beginning disfluency + merged words + dictionary terms
